data: During a long practice of over thirty years I have seen many things enacted here in this city of Montreal which, if told with the skill of a Dumas or a Collins, might not only astonish but startle the sedate residents of this Church-going community.
The Mysteries of Montreal: Being Recollections of a Female Physician
